recipe.name: Banana Split Desert

ingredient.preparation: sliced and dipped in lemon juice#

recipe.preparation: Crust:  Mix ingredients in a bowl.  Put in 9x13 pan.  Put in refrigerator to cool while making filling.Filling: Beat together powdered sugar, butter and eggs until smooth and creamy.Place a layer of sliced bananas on crust then a layer of filling, then a layer of crushed pineapple, a layer of sliced strawberries.  Top with chipped cream them sprinkle with chopped nuts & Graham cracker crumbs.NOTE:  While most of the recipes in this collection are kept as true to the original as possible, some notes on this recipe are required.  * - The original recipe lists this as "melted", though "softened" is probably more correct.  Additionally, a modern reference recipe omits the eggs and uses instead 8 oz. of cream cheese.  # -- the measurement here is from the reference recipe and may be a bit overkill given the use of a strawberry layer.
